product_name: Asolo TPS 520 GV Hiking Boots - Women's
long_description: A timeless backpacking boot, the Asolo 520 TPS GV women's boots feature burly full-grain leather uppers, Gore-Tex(R) waterproof protection and enhanced stability and support. Full-grain leather uppers with Gore-Tex(R) waterproof, breathable membranes provide long-lasting protection from the elements. Nylon linings wick moisture away from feet for greater comfort. Gusseted tongues and padded ankle collars keep trail debris out, while Achilles notches prevent collars from digging into tendons on descents. Asoflex(R) thermoplastic insoles provide torsional stability and control while protecting against impact and bruises on rocky and uneven terrain. Triple Power Structure Vibram(R) outsoles combine low-density polyurethane cyclinders in a high-density polyurethane midsole to increase propulsion and support.
short_description: A timeless backpacking boot, the Asolo 520 TPS GV women's boots feature burly full-grain leather uppers, Gore-Tex(R) waterproof protection and enhanced stability and support.
